solution.text:
We have to find the probability of getting a number less than _{i}_ on a single throw of a die.
All possible outcomes = {1,2,3,4,5,6}
So, Total number of outcomes = 6
now,
Let, E be the event 'getting a number less than _{i}_'
So, the number of outcomes favourable to E is _{{i-1}}_
Therefore,
P(E) = \(_{{i-1}}_\over 6\)

content.text: Find the probability of getting a number less than _{i}_ on a single throw of a die.
